title: How do i buy a rune page? Can`t find it in the client

replies.body: TenSpeed is spot on here!  Through the rune section of the store, swap Show Tier 3 to Show All.  This will make the rune pages appear!  Let me know if you have any questions.
Under Gameplay in the store, there is a few tabs to the left, one will say tier 3 by default, change it to say all.
